Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to unlawful discriminatory practices based upon delays in reporting workplace sexual harassment
Summary: Relates to unlawful discriminatory practices based upon delays in reporting workplace sexual harassment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to unlawful discriminatory practices based upon delays in reporting workplace sexual harassment, and in relation to extending the statute of limitations in cases before the state division of human rights of sexual harassment in the workplace; and to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to extending the statue of limitations in cases of sexual harassment in the workplace
